no_dice: , your roll was rejected because you didn't specify any dice types to roll.
wrong_dice: , your roll was rejected because it didn't contain the correct die sizes.
help:
To use the Chronicles of Darkness module please specify a number of dice to roll or call 'init' to use the initiative system. 
 A roll of '0' or 'chance' will roll a chance die.
 You can also specify 'rote', '8-again', '9-again', or 'no-again' to modify your dice roll.
 If calling 'init' any number provided will be used as a modifier to the d10 roll.
